lender.name: Greenlight Apparel
lender.occupational_info:
Greenlight Apparel is an activist clothing brand that produces high-quality casual and technical apparel for large events like marathons or corporate promotions. While a few clothing companies are “sweatshop free,” our mission is to actively work to eradicate illegal child labor and human trafficking.
We dedicate 10% of each sale to humanitarian partner charities that help rescue children from child labor, build schools and create awareness of the world child labor crisis. All Greenlight Apparel merchandise is made with 100% recycled or organic fibers.
Contact Info: Phone: 510-474-3965 Email: info@greenlightapparel.com
Join the movement: Follow us on www.facebook.com/GreenlightApparel or www.twitter.com/GreenlightInc

lender.name: Tsveta
lender.loan_because:
I'm a small business owner and I know how hard it is to get a loan if your business is not established. I'm trying to help small business owners around the world with small loans.
When I was just starting out, I had the luck to meet people that had built businesses from the ground up, and their feedback and advice was invaluable. Another part of my success is the fact that I had access to credit and this is the main reason I'm lending on Kiva.org - to help others in their entrepreneur journey.
I'll be inviting all my business peers to join Kiva.org and help with what they can, so we can all live in a better world.

lender.name: MexicoProject
lender.loan_because: MexicoProject is a non-profit organization dedicated to helping those in need.
lender.occupational_info:
MexicoProject is committed to using our resources and talents to serve those in need. Beginning in the colonias of Tamaulipas, Mexico, we are willing and ready to serve wherever we are called in whatever way we are able.
One of our eventual goals is to design a ministry center for Bruce and Paula, the missionaries that we work with in Mexico. The ministry center will consist of two floors, one of which will be used exclusively for lodging. This will help when people come down to help build in the colonia by lending them a place to stay, saving time and money. The first floor will consist of a kitchen, pantry, bathroom, and large multipurpose room. Bruce and Paula will use this building to cook meals for the families in need, host bible studies, and a variety of events.

lender.occupational_info: I work on buildings to ensure that they are durable and resist the weather while keeping the indoor environment healthy, comfortable, and safe. I work with insulations, waterproof materials, and structural components of buildings, among other materials.
